name: Mafia Dons By Region Quiz | Mafia and The Mob | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Raymond Patriarca.

	His home base was Rhode Island.

Sam Giancana.

	There is good reason to believe he is behind the JFK assassination!

Nicky Scarfo.

	Defines psychopath. While personally killing a man, he was heard to say 'I love this. I love it.'

Carlos Marcello.

	Without warning, Attorney General Robert Kennedy had him picked up, flown to Honduras, and left in the middle of nowhere. Way to go, Bobby! Unfortunately, Marcello simply caught a plane back to the states and entered illegally.

Santo Trafficante.

	The other three are all from the 'Godfather' movie!

Michael Franzese.

	Though most mafiosi are uneducated slobs from rough backgrounds, Franzese was a preppy who had three years of college till he dropped out to become a member of organized crime. He wrote a book entitled 'How the Yuppie Don Quit the Mob and Learned to Tell All.'

Anthony 'Big Tuna' Accardo.

	Accardo has the dubious distinction of being the only mafioso to stay in power for nearly six decades without ever having spent a single night in jail.

Ruggiero Boiardo.

	The others are among the earliest known Mafia dons in Sicily, with Vito Ferro being the first.
